### PLEASE READ THIS!
###
### TO EVERYBODY: This is the master index files for db packages produced at
### the Gentleman-Lab. It is for Gentleman-Lab's internal use only.
###
### TO GENTLEMAN LAB MEMBERS: This file contains absolute paths that point to
### our NFS-mounted shared partition. This means that you must use
### makeAnnDbPkg("pkg") on a server where user homes are NFS-mounted for
### this to work (e.g. on any gopher).


### =========================================================================
### HUMANCHIP_DB schema
### -------------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: HUMANCHIP.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
### HUMANCHIP_DB > Affymetrix chips

Package: hcg110.db
Version: 2.6.4
PkgTemplate: HUMANCHIP.DB
DBfile: /mnt/cpb_anno/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/hcg110.sqlite
AnnObjPrefix: hcg110
species: Human
manufacturer: Affymetrix

### =========================================================================
### MOUSECHIP_DB schema
### -------------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: MOUSECHIP.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

### =========================================================================
### RATCHIP_DB schema
### -----------------
###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: RATCHIP.DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Version: 2.6.4
PkgTemplate: RATCHIP.DB
DBfile: /mnt/cpb_anno/mcarlson/sanctionedSqlite/rgug4105a.sqlite

species: Rat
manufacturer: Agilent

###   Fields:
###     Package (*)
###     Title
###     Version (*)
###     PkgTemplate: HUMAN.DB|MALARIA.DB|MOUSE.DB|RAT.DB|FLY.DB|YEAST.DB|ZEBRAFISH.DB|ECOLI_DB|CANINE_DB|BOVINE_DB|WORM_DB|PIG_DB|CHICKEN_DB
###     DBfile (*)
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix (*)
###     AnnObjTarget (*)
###     organism
###     species
###     biocViews (*)
### Fields marked with an (*) are required.

### AFFYHUEX_DB schema
### ------------------
###   Fields:
###     Package
###     Title
###     Version
###     PkgTemplate: AFFYHUEX.DB

###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix
###     AnnObjTarget

### - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
### Affymetrix chips

Package: huex10stv2.db
